Uses of Package
market.assets

Packages that use market.assets
Package
Description
market.assets
Package with all type of goods we can buy/sell
market.assets.marketIndex
Since market Index is a little bit more complicated asset it has separate package
market.entityCreator
Package with tools needed to create all kind of object in the simulation.
market.gui
Package with all controllers needed to create and manage GUI.
market.interfaces
Just definitions of miscelenous interfaces which are implemented by some objects.
market.markets
Objects on which we can buy and sell differents goods
market.traders
Package with different type of traders, each of them behaves a little bit differently.
market.transactions
Tools for handiling transactions.
market.world
Tools for creating a container of all objects in the simulation, using which different objects can communicate with one another.
  • Classes in market.assets used by market.assets
    Class
    Description
    Asset
    This is root class for all assets available in the market
    AssetBackedByCurrency
    In general if something is Backed by some particular currency.
    Currency
    Class representing Currency in our world.
